EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Your copy of the Nokia Application note, {{my.whitepaperTitle:default=WaveLite: Redefining enterprise optical transport}}, is ready to download.
For further information, please visit our website <https://networks.nokia.com/products/wavelite>.
Join our on demand Enterprise Private Optical Networks webcast <[[https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1162760&tp_key=c5a80170ce&sti=nokia]]>that was recorded on October 3, 2017. <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201320]]>Download Application note <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201320]]> Â©{{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
